page.title: 08My Day
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30a.m. I get washed and then have my breakfast at about 8.00a.m. I will always have either Rice Krispies or Cornflakes. I have 1 spoonful of sugar and plenty of milk . After breakfast I go and clean my teeth. I have a blue tooth brush. Then I go downstairs and mum does my hair in a ponytail or bunches. Once I've got my lunch box safely in my bag I'm ready for school.I go outside while mum gets the car out of the garage. We collect our friend to go to school. To get to school we have to go through Framfield. When I get to school I walk up a big hill. Then I'm in the playground where I play with my best friend Andrea. When Mr. Owen rings the bell we all stand still. Then he calls out each class and you go in to your classroom.
